sentences.en: About 500,000 and over a million wild animals died in the Colosseum games.
sentences.cn: 大约有500,000人和一百多万只动物死于角斗游戏中.

sentences.en: Colosseum is a landmark documentary that will answer these questions.
sentences.cn: 《罗马斗兽场》将逐一解答以上购乐学的问题.

sentences.en: Colosseum is the mark of Rome.
sentences.cn: “角斗场将与罗马共存;角斗场倒塌之日,亦即罗马毁灭之时;而罗马毁灭之时,世界亦将崩溃. ”

sentences.en: COLOSSEUM, ITALY: The 50,000 - seat amphitheater 3 in Rome was inaugurated in A . D . 80.
sentences.cn: 罗马圆形大剧场(意大利): 容纳5万人的罗马竞技场建于 公元 80年.

sentences.en: Each of the first three levels of the Colosseum has eighty large rounded arch openings.
sentences.cn: 罗马)竞技场底部分三层,每层都有八十个宽大的圆拱门.

sentences.en: In short - vote for Colosseum, because it is now a symbol of - Joy & Suffering!
sentences.cn: 简而言之 – 古罗马斗兽场是快乐 和 痛苦的象征, 为它投上一票吧!

sentences.en: One of the wonders of the world, the Colosseum in Rome, is falling down.
sentences.cn: 世界奇迹之一——罗马圆形大 剧场 正在倒塌.

sentences.en: Song: Have you ever seen the Colosseum? Have you seen Niagara Falls?
sentences.cn: 歌曲: 你见过罗马椭圆形竞技场 吗 ?你见过尼加拉瓜大瀑布 吗 ?

sentences.en: The Colosseum and Trevi Fountain aren't even mentioned in a hot - off - the - press guide to Rome.
sentences.cn: 一本新鲜出炉的罗马指南中对罗马竞技场和许愿池只字未提.

sentences.en: Torch cans female priests in the company of slowly to the ancient Colosseum.
sentences.cn: 圣火罐在女祭司们的陪伴下缓缓走向古代竞技场.

trans.tran_cn: 罗马圆形大剧场(建于公元80年,耗时5年,至今大部分尚存)
